attributes.action: Give 50% rate relief to businesses with TOTAL premises rateable value £14,999 or less
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The existing rate relief is 50% for business premises with a rateable value of £14,999 or less. 
Business Centres  are designed for small businesses to grow. For example a printer might start working in a unit with a rateable vale of £4,000 and is granted 50% rate relief. If he then grows his business and requires an additional unit within the same Business Centre that has a rateable value of £2,200, he will loose the 50% relief because the additional unit is greater than £2,199 even though the total Rateable value is less then £14,999.

The relief should be given regardless of the number of units (rooms) the business occupies within a Business Centre if the total rateable value is still £14,999 or less
